tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id INT,
  city VARCHAR,
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CropData (
  crop_id INT,
  crop_name VARCHAR,
  planting_date DATE,
  harvest_date DATE,
  yield FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE CropRecommendations (
  recommendation_id INT,
  city VARCHAR,
  crop_name VARCHAR,
  recommended_date DATE,
  recommended_yield FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);
